description:
Clean your boots and make them waterproof again. This kit has everything you need to get your hiking boots, winter boots or street shoes ready for wet weather. Good for any non-leather footwear including nubuck, suede and fabric.

  • Designed to care for nubuck, suede or fabric
  • Includes a 118ml bottle of ReviveX Boot Cleaner Concentrate, one 118ml bottle of ReviveX Nubuck, Suede and Fabric Water Repellent Treatment, a boot brush and a scuff eraser block
  • Safe for footwear with waterproof-breathable laminates including GORE-TEX and eVent
name: Gear Aid Revivex Suede and Fabric Boot Care Kit
